name: Spiced Pork Freekeh
instructions: Bring Freekeh, broth concentrate, and water to a boil, once boiling reduce to a simmer and cook until liquid is absorbed, 25-28 minutes
Toss cubed squash, half moroccan spice blend, salt, and pepper with oil on a parchment-lined baking sheet
Bake on middle rack until golden-brown and tender, 22-24 minutes; stir half way through the time
Mince the garlic and slice the almonds
Toast almonds in a dry pan over medium-high heat until golden-brown, 4-5 minutes; remove once done
Add a bit more oil, then cook the pork and the other half of the moroccan spice blend until golden brown and cooked through (71˚C/160˚F), 3-4 minutes; remove once done
Add a bit more oil, then cook onions until softened, 2-3 minutes
Add garlic and harissa spice blend, cook until fragrant, 30 seconds
Wilt spinach with onions and garlic, 1-2 minutes
When freekeh is done, add onions, half of currants, half of toasted almonds
Serve the freekeh and top with squash, pork, crumpled feta, currants and almonds
